activities.name: fetchSwitchCommandType
activities.description: Based on SourceType and LoadType SQL procedure will fetch switch command type

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
  srcSys.SourceID
, ldTyp.LoadTypeName AS SourceToBlobLoadTypeName
FROM ETL.SourceSystem srcSys
LEFT JOIN ETL.LoadType ldTyp ON ldTyp.LoadTypeId = srcSys.LoadTypeId
WHERE srcSys.SourceName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceName}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
  srcSys.SourceID
FROM ETL.SourceSystem srcSys
WHERE srcSys.SourceName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceName}'

properties.description: run the NOPV datasets from blob json files into EDW_Discovery
